patthana19.1:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana19.1:2.1_2: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:2.1_3: Vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana19.1:2.1_4: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
